comments.author: steve5946
comments.body: Sometimes people will post an ad here and I'll be like wow. What proof do you provide here that you are a seller? Nothing. No money on escrow and nothing. And you are also using a newbie account. What will indicate that you won't run away with people's money? How can we believe that you truly exchange crypto? If you are a buyer, will you contact someone that posted what you posted above?
